checkinInstructions: Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival

body: Up to 2 children (17 years old and younger) stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding

This property uses solar energy, plus eco-friendly cleaning products.

needToKnow.title: You need to know

summary.tagline: Pet-friendly Berlin hotel with bar/lounge, connected to a shopping center

items.text: Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival
Credit card, debit card, or cash deposit required for incidental charges
Government-issued photo ID may be required
Up to 2 children (17 years old and younger) stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding
Onsite self parking (EUR 6 per day; includes in/out privileges)
Electric vehicle charging point on site
Buffet breakfast (surcharge) each morning 7:00 AM–11:00 AM
Annual offsets purchased for at least 10% of carbon footprint
Humane treatment of captive wild animals
At least 10% of profits reinvested in community & sustainability
Buffet breakfast (surcharge) each morning 7:00 AM–11:00 AM
Annual offsets purchased for at least 10% of carbon footprint
Humane treatment of captive wild animals
At least 10% of profits reinvested in community & sustainability

editorial.title: Berlin
content: Located near the beach, a&o Berlin Kolumbus is in Lichtenberg neighborhood and is connected to a shopping center. Barnim Nature Park and Gardens of the World reflect the area's natural beauty and area attractions include Zoo Berlin and Tierpark Berlin. Looking to enjoy an event or a game while in town? See what's going on at Olympiastadion, or consider a night out at silent green Kulturquartier.

primary.value: Disinfectant is used to clean the property
Protective shields in place at main contact areas
Personal protective equipment worn by staff
Individually-wrapped food options available for breakfast
This information is provided by our partners.

content.text: When you stay at a&o Berlin Kolumbus, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Alexanderplatz and Checkpoint Charlie. You can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge, and buffet breakfast is available daily. Other highlights include a snack bar/deli and a garden. Fellow travelers like the helpful staff and family-friendly amenities. The property is just a short walk to public transportation: Genslerstraße Tram Stop is 7 minutes and Arendsweg Tram Stop is 10 minutes.

primary.value: Disinfectant is used to clean the property
Protective shields in place at main contact areas
Personal protective equipment worn by staff
Individually-wrapped food options available for breakfast
This information is provided by our partners.

content.text: You'll be asked to pay the following charges by the property at check-in or check-out:

• A city tax is imposed by the city of Berlin. Business travelers with proof of business-related travel are exempt from this tax. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.
  • An effective city/local tax rate of 4.67 percent will be charged

• Buffet breakfast is offered for an extra charge of approximately EUR 9.3 for adults and EUR 4.65 for children
  • Early check-in can be arranged for an extra charge of EUR 12.50 (subject to availability)
  • Late check-out can be arranged for an extra charge of EUR 12.50 (subject to availability)
• Pets are allowed for an extra charge of EUR 12.50 per pet, per night
• Self parking costs EUR 6 per day with in/out privileges

This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.

Disinfectant is used to clean the property.

Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests.

Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; guests are provided with hand sanitizer.

Contactless check-out is available.

Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast.
